version_description: - bug in history function fixed
- bugfixes & improvements
- bug in search bar (when enter valid URL) fixed
-bugfixes and improvements

- bugfixes and improvements
- switched from banner ads to interstital ads to provide a better browsing experience for you

• major code update
• bugfix in upload photos
- improvements
Improvements
improvements

feature request fullfilled:
set your own homepage
Desktop Browser displays the mobile or the desktop version of a website.

• general improvements
• new "browse plus" features (for purchase) - tab browsing, fullscreen browsing
improvements

• rename a bookmark
• portrait and landscape rotation issue fixed
• tap and hold on a link or image issue fixed
• new full screen scrolling behaviour for browse "plus" customers

We provide regular updates and improvements for Desktop Browser.
If you have a good idea or want to report a issue don't hesitate to send us a mail.
desktop.browser@spicyapps.com

Thanks to the users who purchase a feature - it helps to continue the development of Desktop Browser.
What's new with this update:
• share and save PDF, JPG & PNG files
• a crash issue in bookmarks fixed
improvements

The app is under constant development and will be improved and updated frequently.
We listen to your feedback and implement improvements to make a better product.
If you like to send us your thoughts, don't hesitate to contact us.
support@spicyapps.com

The app is under constant development and will be improved and updated frequently.
We listen to your feedback and implement improvements to make a better product.
If you like to send us your thoughts, don't hesitate to contact us.
support@spicyapps.com
new: added Touch ID to secure the app
bugfix in new Touch ID feature
fixed minor issues with user agents

user request fulfilled: 
•clear cookies and caches (you find it in the settings)

• fix with popups windows 
you can allow or block popups in the setting
fixes sign into web services like facebook
• added printing
(…for browse plus users only)
• support for dark mode
• easier URL text input
• use sadp:// instead of http:// to launch websites in "Desktop Browser" app 
for example: sadp://www.spicyapps.com

new feature added for "browse plus"

• open link in new tab 

how it works: long press on a link in browse plus section, new context menu will appear
• issue in PDF viewing fixed

new for "browse plus" users:
• save webpage to PDFs
• selective history deletion
• change search engine
• improved fullscreen mode
• save PDFs to files
ui improvements
•localisation for 8 new languages

Thanks for your feedback. 
We have integrated a feature many plus users requested:
Now you can launch the app direct into plus mode.
You can configure it in the app settings.
minor UI improvements
Issue with bookmarks view fixed.
• language adaptation for Arabic
• lock the app with Face ID added.
• Autosuggestion for searching with Google added
